000: I was looking around on this former shunting yard. Furtheron there were these empty sheds.
001: The back entrance of the depot.
004: Forbidden to smoke in three languages. Some of the warning signs even had english as fourth language.
005: Inside the sheds were as good as empty and a big mess. And a lot of graffiti. There was some local youth hanging around at the time I visited the place.
